allow_untemplated_requests.description: Set true to allow requests that don't call or match any template.

log_original_request.description: Set true to add the original request to the Kong log plugin(s) output.

max_request_body_size.description: max allowed body size allowed to be introspected. 0 means unlimited, but the size of this body will still be limited by Nginx's client_max_body_size.

templates.description: Array of templates available to the request context.

name.description: Unique name for the template, can be called with `{template://NAME}`

template.description: Template string for this request, supports mustache-style `{{placeholders}}`
